name: The Goonies
overview: Rescue the kidnapped Goonies from the clutches of the Fratelli gang! In this ColecoVision port of the MSX game based on the hit movie, you play as Brand, the older member of the Goonies gang who needs to save the remaining 7 Goonies from the Fratelli family, a treacherous group of thieves. Find keys and use them to free your friends from their jails located in the underground tunnels of the Fratelli's lair. Punch the Fratelli pursuers to stun them, and avoid traps and other dangers. The Goonies are counting on you!
